course.subject: SBMT
course.name: SBM Undergraduate Honors Research Project
course.description: The two‐term SBM Undergraduate Honors Research Project is for SBM students who are interested in pursuing systematic research at the senior undergraduate level. The course will act as a pre‐doctoral training program to help students expand their options in seeking future doctoral study opportunities. Students are expected to research a focused problem under close supervision by a faculty and produce a thesis after completing this course. For SBM students in their final year of study only. Approval from the course coordinator is needed prior to enrolling in the course. May be graded PP.
